We elected a human being, Barack Obama .''`` I think he has reached out to countries around the world and has developed good relations with countries around the world,'' Colin Powell said. And I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment which I think is the major problem facing America right now, and I think and I hope that this will be the centerpiece of the State of the Union speech. Dismissing widespread speculation that he might take a job in the Barack Obama administration, possibly replacing href="http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Robert Gates-Robert Gates"> Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role. '' Another Donald Rumsfeld nemesis, as painTed Kennedy in these pages, was Deputy Secretary of State Richard Armitage .`` His leaks were so brazen,'' Donald Rumsfeld writes, that he told Colin Powell to manage his deputy: Rich Richard Armitage has been badmouthing the Pentagon all over town. It's been going on for some time and it's only gotten worse... I don't know what the hell is in Richard Armitage 's craw, but I'm tired of it. Colin Powell , in turn, expressed concern that Donald Rumsfeld 's deputy, Paul Wolfowitz ,`` was leaking against him''- which Donald Rumsfeld says he did not believe. Anthony Ervin and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday. He got going early, leaking out on the fast break and getting easy layups. He then moved to the outside, going 4-for-8 from 3-point range. He got a couple of easy ones, and once you get a couple of layups, the basket looks bigger, said Allen Iverson , who had 28 points.`` He played a great game, and hopefully he can continue to play that way.'' Linas Kleiza scored 27 points in the first half, 20 in the second quarter
